meanings.definition: Failing to fulfill expectations or hopes.
meanings.sent2: The cake turned out to be disappointing.
meanings.sent3: It was disappointing to find out the ice cream truck had run out of ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The empty playground was a disappointing sight.
meanings.sent5: The rainy picnic was truly disappointing.

meanings.definition: Causing someone to feel sad or displeased by not being as good as expected.
meanings.sent1: The test results were disappointing for the students.
meanings.sent2: The broken toy was disappointing for the child.
meanings.sent3: It was disappointing to see the magician's trick fail.
meanings.sent4: The wilted flowers were a disappointing gift.
meanings.sent5: The canceled concert was truly disappointing.
